channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Car Suspension Problem
item.description: The following problem is from a high-school-level physics puzzle book Gn√§dig, Honyek, and Riley (2001) (Problem #9): The suspension springs of all four wheels of a car are identical. By how much does the body of the car (considered rigid) rise above each of the wheels when its right front wheel is parked on an 8-cm-high pavement? Does the result change when the car is parked with both right wheels on the pavement?

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
